characters.name: Jim
characters.endDialogue: Thank you, have a nice day!

groceries.dialogue: I’m just here to pick up the essentials for my macro diet.
Needed this for my workout today, I have to make sure my diet is perfect!
Thank god I can get right into these without having to worry much about cooking or anything. They’re cheap too, about the cheapest I could find.
I'm hoping I could get my EBT card back up and running if I can figure out how to work some hours these coming weeks.
Haha yeah this is totally all I will need for today sir,

characters.name: Carrie On
characters.startDialogue: Just making my grocery run before I go home to make dinner for the family!

groceries.dialogue: I was a little upset about how much they increased the price of chicken per pound, however. Ugh, I guess everything is going up in price.
Oh wow, those seem to be quite expensive, I was sure when I picked them up last week they were only a couple of dollars. My kids love them.

I know people have been talking about the people who buy their sweets with EBT. I'd just hope they would understand a situation like mine, it's nice to be able to give my kids a treat without going out and spending a lot of money.
Yeah, I'm actually here on behalf of my sister, in her old age she just cannot get around as much as she used to. Now I grocery shop for her.
She can't cook too much anymore, so I mostly just buy her the frozen stuff because it's easier for her, and I always make sure to get her favorite soda too.

characters.name: Nicki Swiper
characters.endDialogue: But hey it just isn't possible right now when my job is only giving me one shift a week!

groceries.dialogue: I have been really craving a candy bar... and nothing else.  I would love to buy a full cart of groceries...
It seems my sister has run out of her usual stuff so I figured I would drop by after work and pick up some of her favorites.

Oh yea! That's her favorite soda right there, she barely ever wants to touch her water when I buy her a new case of these haha.  I like to get her one as a treat every now and then when I pick up her groceries.
Trying something new today... I am thinking maybe after a while of eating all of the frozen processed stuff she should probably get something different that is really fresh.

characters.name: Jesus
characters.startDialogue: Ugh, it's been a tough week.
characters.endDialogue: They will never understand a situation like mine, I need to get out of here.

groceries.dialogue: Just scan my stuff so I can get out of here.
All that time trying to find some decent work and I can never so much as get an email back when I checked at the library this morning.

characters.name: Jim Golds
characters.startDialogue: Oh hey, it's funny seeing you again.
characters.endDialogue: I am done with putting pollutants in my body!

groceries.dialogue: I am just dropping by to pick up some of the week's grocery needs. I have been doing some reading recommended by this guy in this Facebook group I am a part of.
I have been getting all of my workout tips from him recently, but he’s been telling me that the next step forward is to start making real lifestyle changes.

This was one of the first things he recommended I try, introducing raw milk into my diet rather than using any of the fake alternatives. I plan on using this with my protein powder to really get the maximum gains.

This was one of the other most important tips he gave me, NO MORE SEED OILS. I have been making the terrible mistake of using all the wrong oils when I cook my unseasoned chicken and rice when I should have been using tallow all this time.

characters.name: Carrie On
characters.startDialogue: Ah just stopping by the grocery store on my way home, I can't wait to cook a nice homemade meal for my kids.
characters.endDialogue: Thank you, have a nice day.

groceries.dialogue: We've only really eaten out these past couple of days, waiting for my EBT card to refill.
Oh I love these as breakfast essentials and they go such a long way which is nice later in the week.
I really try to maximize every food group and make sure I am eating a healthy meal even though I am on a strict budget! I have to make sure I am feeling good for these long days.

Oh no! I forgot that they banned sugary drinks like soda from being accepted by my EBT card. Oh, that is so frustrating I was not prepared to pay the full price of that but I have to be able to have some small things for myself right? Oh well..

characters.name: Jesus
characters.startDialogue: Hey! I finally heard back from a job, and now that I meet the minimum required work hours for an able-bodied person, I finally was able to get an EBT Card set up.
characters.endDialogue: Thank you, have a good one!

groceries.dialogue: This is the first time in a while that I can really buy something a little bit more expensive!

I know they got rid of all the sugary stuff for EBT, but honestly I am just happy to be eating something that isn’t ramen or the usual hotdogs, honestly. It is nice to know I can walk in here and get something like bread when I need to.
Haha! I used to love eating these as a kid and ever since I have been craving when I could finally start buying my own again. I am not used to cooking just yet, so these will help me out greatly.

I guess old habits die hard, but these feel a bit comforting now that I can buy all sorts of different food. I know I will love these, and for once I don’t have to worry about how much they will cost. EBT has truly changed my life!

characters.name: Nicki Swiper
characters.startDialogue: Wow, that guy sure seemed amped to buy some bread, huh? I have no idea what he was talking about.
characters.endDialogue: I don’t need to mess with that EBT stuff, I would hate to be perceived as though I could not buy my own groceries…

groceries.dialogue: Anyway, I will just take this candy bar, please.

characters.name: Carrie On
characters.startDialogue: I can’t wait to get back home and relax after such a long day.

groceries.dialogue: I’m even going to buy a couple of “luxury” items today because I need a treat!

My kids hate broccoli, but if it allows them to grow up healthier, they are going to have to eat it! I am just waiting for the day they take THAT off of EBT, ugh. It is like they believe that less fortunate people do not deserve some small luxuries.
Well, I am just glad to be able to go home safely today, but I sure do hope they reverse the ban on sugary products!

characters.name: Jim Golds
characters.startDialogue: Hey, you would not believe the problems I have been having ever since you rang me up last time!
characters.endDialogue: I really learned my lesson, maybe not all “health” products are actually good for my diet!

groceries.dialogue: It turns out the guy in my Facebook group was spreading total misinformation about food safety, and we actually had to ban him! I did some further research, and it turns out that drinking raw milk could totally give me sicknesses and stuff. I could not believe it!

I tried using the beef tallow in place of oils as well for my cooking, and it made me feel terrible before going to the gym. I think I am going to switch out from only using those products the guy mentioned. I want to be able to eat as healthy as possible without getting sick so I am prepared for the gym.

characters.startDialogue: Hey there! It’s nice to see you again after I explained the whole situation to you about my sister.
characters.endDialogue: Thank you so much for the help, bye!

groceries.dialogue: Yeah, as it turns out, she really loved some of the fresh food that I bought her last time. So today, I am preparing to cook her a fresh, balanced, homemade meal.
I am so excited to be able to surprise her with all of this. I sometimes get worried about her health when she really only eats all the frozen products.

To top it all off, I am making sure I buy her favorite soda so that she can enjoy her fresh meal with her favorite drink. Even though she faces a tough time buying and using certain groceries, I am happy that I am there for her to provide her with a better alternative!
